title: What do spiritual leaders say about the vaccine? Will they be taking the vaccine shot?
description: Answer (1 of 6): An estimated 95,000 people (approximately 68,000 men and 27,000 women) die from alcohol-related causes annually, making alcohol the third-leading preventable cause of death in the United States. The first is tobacco, and the second is poor diet and physical inactivity. The three...
